snippet: From a daring attempt by a group of friends to one of the most iconic endurance races in the world, the 246-km Spartathlon has defied the downturn in Greek sports, drawing record numbers as ultra marathons become more popular....

headline.print_headline: Legends, Sandals and Sweat, Spartathlon Ticks All Boxes
headline.main: Legends, Sandals and Sweat, Spartathlon Ticks All Boxes

lead_paragraph: From a daring attempt by a group of friends to one of the most iconic endurance races in the world, the 246-km Spartathlon has defied the downturn in Greek sports, drawing record numbers as ultra marathons become more popular.
